title: How would a fight between your two highest mastery champions go?
body:
http://i51.photobucket.com/albums/f394/Scweeb64/mk9_fight.png

thinking poppy and kha would probably have a hell of a fight. poppy would be able to get on him and absolutely leave lethal attacks with that hammer, but I think that kha would be able to avoid most of it with his near flying and invisibility. I think overall kah probably has the advantage and would win.

replies.body: {{champion:67}} vs {{champion:157}} Uhh. The fuck is happening here?
I see you've chosen cancer and more cancer as your two champions, how's the chemo treating you.
{{champion:4}} vs{{champion:104}}  Coulda sworn we just fixed this shit

{{champion:1}}: Have you seen my bear Tibbers?
{{champion:117}}: *Turns Annie into a bear*.

{{champion:161}} used Psybeam!

{{champion:101}} used Thunderbolt!

{{champion:161}} used Magnitude!

{{champion:101}} is knocked up and cannot attack!

{{champion:161}} used Earth Power!

{{champion:101}} used Thunderbolt!

{{champion:161}} used Hyper Beam!

{{champion:101}} used Thunder!

IN THE FAVOR OF SORAKA
*Because Bananas*
dat 1% crit rune.
Yeah demigod versus regular human MF should prolly stay home

This would be one scary ass fight

{{champion:203}}  V. {{champion:102}} 

{{champion:102}} Shaa, let's go sheep. _Transforms into...
http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-C8n1xtpjwIA/T00X_hLycII/AAAAAAAAAYw/M9Mc4nM8s14/s1600/hellkite_igniter.jpg_ 

{{champion:203}} |:3 ;3
http://ih0.redbubble.net/image.24937440.0655/fc,550x550,black.u1.jpg

{{champion:50}} vs {{champion:37}} 

Swain would morph into a bird and eat her, obviously.

{{champion:412}} V{{champion:201}} 

*Starts off on a snowy dawn.... Thresh has threaten the lives of the very people braum loves... THE POROS. After thresh had shown how lethal he can be, after all he has the soul of Lucian's wife. Braum gathers the Poros that have survived thresh's onslaught to protect them. Thresh tracked them down where they'd finally face off*

{{champion:412}} : I do not wish to gather the soul of such a man, just the pathetic souls of these "creatures" you call "Poro's"

{{champion:201}} : I'm afraid thresh, in order for you to gather the souls of these last surviving poro's. You'll have to go through me.

{{champion:412}} : *He grabs his scythe hook and gives a small laugh* "Are you sure you wish to die? You'll just become another flesh bag for nocturne if you carry on like this.

{{champion:201}} *With a fire in his eyes Braum stands strong with his shield on his right arm. He puts the shield down and leans on it*  "My soul is with the people of the Frejord. If I die protecting the animal life of them. So be it!

{{champion:412}} : *FOOL!*

*Battle starts*

{{champion:412}} makes the first move, throwing his hook at Braum. Braum, being the badass he is grabs his shield and puts it up (his E, unbreakable) yet somehow he still gets the hook around braum (cause riot logic) 

{{champion:201}} , trapped as he is slowly being pulled to his death, he drops the shield and falls to the side, slipping out of the hook of threshes. He quickly grabs his shield and throws a poro at thresh ({{summoner:31}} ). Thresh trying to gather up his hook gets smacked by the poro. Confused by the creature, he shrugs it off, as braum flies towards thresh  (For some reason dash isnt a summoner or it'd be here). Smacking thresh with his shield. (Passive of braums)

{{champion:412}} : tho recovering from the attack, he throws his lantern down to give himself a shield, with the shield protecting him he looks to thresh and cuts him down his chest with his scythe. Braum flinches a tad from the massive gash that thresh's attack did (flay passive)

{{champion:201}} : With a smile on his face, he looks to thresh. "heh. Idiot." He jumps in the air to slam down, causing a massive crack in the ground. Thresh gets knocked up into the air as he slams his back down into the snowy ground. Braum smacks him one more time as a loud CLASH noise is  made. (Passive proc of bruam).

{{champion:412}} as badly wounded as that blow was, thresh laughs and laughs at him. "I'm the idiot? heheh."  Thresh smiles as he summons a massive box around them. Forcing braum to be on his own.  

*As the fight rages on, blows after blow on each other, however like all fights and all things in life. This must end*

Braum, bleeding heavily from all the blows looks to thresh... Who seems to be... dying? He looks badly wounded as well. With the box still around them. braum looks to thresh. He knows what he must do to save the people he loves. He throws his shield down and grabs thresh 

{{champion:201}} "as my mother always said... DON'T LOSE!" 

*He picks him up as thresh tries to grab  his lantern but fails to. He charges right into a wall of the box, causing a massive explosion. As the snow settles... as the poros run away out of fear that thresh could have lived... Time slowly fades as {{champion:34}} flies around to locate braum to regroup with the armies of ashe (pretty sure he's with ashe, right?) she spots him, half frozen in the ground. As she flies down to grab him. Some small laughter is heard as a scythe flies out of the snow and wraps its self around the bird lady. Thresh uh, half "dead" you might say, part of his skull face is cracked as ghostly gas flies out of his body.* 

Thresh looks at braum's slowly decaying body... 

{{champion:412}} "I... Win...."

{{champion:202}} The stage is set..
{{champion:121}} This one is all alone, and barely worth eating!
{{champion:202}} The lighting is perfection..
{{champion:121}} Isolate...and DEVOUR
{{champion:202}} Alien 4, scene 4...ACTION
{{champion:121}} *A timer starts ticking as he moves through the bush towards Jhin, and a lotus flower blossoms near him*
{{champion:121}} This pollen and nectar! Must DEVOUR!
{{champion:202}} *Counting with the ticks of the flower next to Kha, as he flips his extended, shoulder mounted rifle into position* 1..2..3...FOUR! *GUNSHOT*
{{champion:51}} BOOM, headshot!

The battle of the Naked Babes.
Duh Janna would win. Flying types counter Grass Types
{{champion:161}} vs{{champion:245}}  This would be interesting but I think vel'koz would win because he would incinerate him before ekko could rewind.

{{champion:111}} "Beware the Depths. For I am the Juggernaut that will be your end. None can best my strength, none can pierce my armor, non can ecape my grasp!"
{{champion:78}} pops out of bush. picks up random hammer "Hey look. I found a hammer! It says Mjölnir on the side....what's that mean?"
{{champion:111}} "....crap....."

{{champion:84}} vs {{champion:28}}

To hell with fighting; I ship this!

**EDIT:** I'm putting back the original post (well, something close, I don't remember every detail).

{{champion:84}} You know I can see you whenever you get close?
{{champion:28}} Because that bight red circle around your shroud is the epitome of subtle? Also I bought a {{item:2043}} .
{{champion:84}} Riot must truly hate us if your passive and my W are countered by such a cheap item.
{{champion:28}} You may be right; have you seen my lore?
{{champion:84}} *Nods sympathetically.* I have. You have my condolences.
{{champion:28}} *Sighs.* I'm no longer in the mood to fight you. Why were we doing this anyway?
{{champion:84}} It was because of some post on the Memes & Games section of the NA boards.
{{champion:28}} That's just... Let's just not do this right now.
{{champion:84}} Agreed. It is a shame you wasted your gold on that pink ward.
{{champion:28}} *Looks at Akali. Looks at the pink ward in her hand. Looks back at Akali. Smiles seductively.* Oh, I wouldn't call it a waste.
{{champion:84}} *Looks at Evelynn. Looks at the pink ward in Evelynn's hand. Looks back at Evelynn.* Oh. I see.
{{champion:28}} *Approaches Akali.* So... how long does that shroud of yours last?
{{champion:84}} Long enough. *Uses W.*
hahaha
I just checked my mobile app and my status is currently "Akali <3 Evelynn"; 'tis rather apropos.
it's only kinda sad that most the guys here didn't get to read that original post
I was afraid it violated the rules; I can certainly put it back (I remember how it went).
pretty sure it violated some rules, was a fun read though.
